description: End users may observe that unauthorized system privileges can be gained by attackers on vulnerable systems. This behavior poses a significant risk to Windows 10 and Windows 11 installations with specific build numbers: 10.0.22631.2715, 10.0.19043.3693, and 10.0.14393.6452, as outlined in the security updates KB5032190, KB5032192, and KB5032197. These symptoms indicate a potential elevation of privilege that could compromise the integrity and confidentiality of the affected systems.
